channel.title: How do i give my server unlimited run? [562]

item.title: How do i give my server unlimited run? [562]
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“xXThatOneSkaterKidXx, post:24, topic:438366”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=541085.msg3964672#msg3964672 date=1333586959]

Nonononono I want to eliminate run draining entirely in the game.
Like in any other server.

Go into config.java and edit the tiles it takes to drain to something about 2billion? (Lol, I did this on my 459, I don’t know if it works on 562)

Nah if you go over 100 it crashes

It didn’t for me.
[/quote]

You’re using a 562?[/quote]
Nopey nope.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:18, topic:438366”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=541085.msg3964610#msg3964610 date=1333584177]

Nonononono I want to eliminate run draining entirely in the game.
Like in any other server.

Go into config.java and edit the tiles it takes to drain to something about 2billion? (Lol, I did this on my 459, I don’t know if it works on 562)

Holy shit… do you have any idea what a waste of memory that is?

I know like nothing on this, you could probably it somewhere that disabled run energy decreasing but I’m stupid
[/quote]

Event
...
energy--;

You’d just have to remove the energy–;… of course this is pseudocode[/quote]
exactly, but adapt that into his server now
